lex.template: AGENT-1 serves PATIENT-1 and has a runway length of PATIENT-2 .

lex.text: San Sebastian de los Reyes is part of the Community of Madrid and is also the location of Adolfo Suárez Madrid–Barajas Airport.

lex.text: Adolfo Suárez Madrid–Barajas Airport is found in San Sebastián de los Reyes, part of the Community of Madrid.

lex.text: The Adolfo Suárez Madrid–Barajas Airport is in San Sebastián de los Reyes which is part of the Community of Madrid.
